title: Build Metrics Dashboard Generator
description: Develop scripts/metrics-dashboard.py to calculate task metrics, velocity, confidence trends, and generate health visualizations. Include breakdown effectiveness metrics.
notes: Functions: calculate_velocity(), calculate_confidence_trends(), generate_health_score(), export_metrics_json(). Track breakdown success rate and subtask completion patterns. Real-time metrics without LLM token cost.
assumptions: Metrics stored in JSON for portability
Integration with external dashboard tools via JSON export
decision_rationale: Metrics provide data-driven insights into project health and progress. Essential for understanding breakdown effectiveness.
